participant_1.background:
I'm a meataholic with a furry best friend as my ring bearer.
i m from california.
I love sushi because it reminds me of the ocean, where my beta fish lives.
I am a unique individual who is comfortable in my own skin.
i love book.

participant_2.background:
I procrastinate on my lesson plans.
I work in a fast-paced environment that encourages me to try new things and learn from my mistakes.
i live on the third floor in an apartment.
My laundry takes a backseat to my many projects.
I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.

content.text: Hello there! I am doing well, how about yourself?
I am doing well, thank you for asking. Where are you from?
That's cool, I am from California as well. I love sushi and books, do you have any hobbies?
I love to read, and I also like to go for walks. I am not very superstitious, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.
I love to read as well, and I also enjoy going for walks. I am not superstitious either, but I do enjoy learning about different cultures and religions.

That's great! I love learning about different cultures and religions as well. I am a teacher, and I love working in a fast-paced environment that encourages me to try new things and learn from my mistakes.
That's awesome! I am a teacher as well. I love working in a fast-paced environment that allows me to be creative and innovative.
That's great! I am glad that we have so much in common.
Me too! It is nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
You too! It is nice to meet you
